statements: UPDATE market_data SET price = 100.50, volume = 500 WHERE symbol = 'ABC';
UPDATE market_data SET timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:00:00', volatility = 0.005 WHERE symbol = 'XYZ';

UPDATE market_data SET timestamp = NOW(), volatility = 0.00325 WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';

UPDATE pricing_data SET price = 55.75 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE volatility_data SET volatility = 0.25, date = '2022-01-20' WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOG';
UPDATE historical_pricing SET open_price = 1000.25, close_price = 1025.75 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE market_risk_analysis SET risk_category = 'High Risk', risk_score = 0.875 WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND symbol = 'GOOGL';
